title: Stabraq
aboutdescription: Stabraq is a modern portfolio template for Framer. It is designed for developers, designers, and freelancers who want to showcase their work in a professional way. The template is fully customizable and easy to use. It includes 6 different sections: Home, About, Services, Portfolio, Testimonials, and Contact. You can easily change the colors, fonts, and images to match your brand. The template is built with Framer Motion, a popular animation library for React. It is responsive and works on all devices. You can use it to create a beautiful portfolio website in minutes.

title: TaskAI
aboutdescription: TaskAI is a SaaS Framer template for project management and task tracking. It is designed for teams and individuals who want to manage their projects and tasks in a simple and efficient way. The template is fully customizable and easy to use. It includes 6 different sections: Home, Features, Pricing, Testimonials, FAQ, and Contact. You can easily change the colors, fonts, and images to match your brand. The template is built with Framer Motion, a popular animation library for React. It is responsive and works on all devices. You can use it to create a beautiful website for your SaaS product in minutes.
